extension.summary: Backend service for streaming providers integration
extension.description:
Ultimate Backend provides a local API service that bridges Kodi with popular streaming providers.
Features: • Live TV streaming from Joyn (DE/AT/CH) and RTL+ • DASH manifest rewriting for seamless playback • DRM support (Widevine, PlayReady, ClearKey) • M3U playlist generation for PVR IPTV Simple Client • Provider-specific proxy configuration • Caching system for improved performance
This service runs in the background and enables live TV channels from streaming platforms to appear directly in Kodi's TV section with full PVR integration.
extension.news: - v1.0.0: Initial release - Support for Joyn DE, AT, CH and RTL+ - Manifest proxying and DRM handling - M3U playlist generation for PVR IPTV Simple - Provider-specific proxy configuration
